<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Auto translates keys</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/v2/projects/{projectId}/keys/{keyId}/auto-translate"}></MethodEndpoint>



Uses enabled auto-translation methods.
You need to set at least one of useMachineTranslation or useTranslationMemory to true.

This will replace the the existing translation with the result obtained from specified source!
    

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"keyId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"projectId","in":"path","required":true,"allowEmptyValue":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"languages","in":"query","description":"Tags of languages to auto-translate. \nWhen no languages provided, it translates only untranslated languages.","required":false,"schema":{"uniqueItems":true,"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"useMachineTranslation","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"boolean"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"useTranslationMemory","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"boolean"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>
